subject: Start script for Gnome
body:
Hi,
when I start a Gnome session, I always have to press printscreen to 
deactivate Speakup; furthermore I have to quit the printscreen dialog.
Is there a script to automatically do this when logging into Gnome? Life 
would be easier.
Hermann

_______________________________________________
Speakup mailing list
Speakup@braille.uwo.ca
http://speech.braille.uwo.ca/mailman/listinfo/speakup
